argument.name: search
argument.description: Text to be used in a full text search. If multiple keywords are specified, each keyword is evaluated separately.

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Defines which search criteria to use to find the desired results. Each filter defines the field or fields to be searched, the condition type, and the search value.

argument.name: pageSize
argument.description: The maximum number of items to return. If no value is specified, the search returns 20 items.

argument.name: currentPage
argument.description: Specifies which page of results to return. If no value is specified, the first page is returned. If you specify a value that is greater than the number of available pages, an error is returned.

argument.name: sort
argument.description: Specifies which field or fields to use for sorting the results. If you specify more than one field, Magento sorts by the first field listed. Then, if any items have the same value, those items will be sorted by the secondary field. The value for each field can be set to either ASC (ascending) or DESC (descending).

field.name: value
field.description: A number expressing a monetary value.

field.name: currency
field.description: A three-letter currency code, such as `USD` or `EUR`.

field.name: amount
field.description: The price of a product plus a three-letter currency code.

field.name: adjustments
field.description: An array that provides information about tax, weee, or weee_tax adjustments.

field.name: amount
field.description: The amount of the price adjustment and its currency code.

field.name: code
field.description: Indicates whether the adjustment involves tax, weee, or weee_tax

field.name: description
field.description: Indicates whether the entity described by the code attribute is included or excluded from the adjustment.

field.name: minimalPrice
field.description: Used for composite (bundle, configurable, grouped) products. This is the lowest possible final price for all the options defined within a composite product. If you're specifying a price range, this would be the 'from' value.

field.name: maximalPrice
field.description: Used for composite (bundle, configurable, grouped) products. This is the highest possible final price for all the options defined within a composite product. If you're specifying a price range, this would be the 'to' value.

field.name: regularPrice
field.description: The base price of a product.

field.description: The position of the category in the category tree
